Package dev.morphia.mapping

Class NamingStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.morphia.mapping.NamingStrategy
  • public abstract class NamingStrategy
extends Object
    Defines a naming strategy for use, e.g., in naming collections and fields
    Since:
    2.0
